title: California’s drought is hitting indigenous Latino workers hard
text:
California’s drought is hitting indigenous Latino workers hard 
Published By: WGBH - Today 
Farmworker Maura Lukas says this year has been the hardest to make ends meet since she came to California more than a dozen years ago. She l...
